alert.note: Alert for Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Concordia Parish, northwestern Lincoln, Jefferson, northern Franklin and northeastern Adams Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Natchez to near Mccall Creek. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mccall Creek and New Hope around 425 PM CDT. Stanton around 435 PM CDT. Spokane, Caseyville, Union Church, Pleasant Hill and Church Hill around 445 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
